title: Scenic Portfolio
description: Diament Collection Scenic Portfolio; black and white and color photographic illustrations of scenic wallpapers. The scenics include: Les Grandes Chasses, U.S.A. War of Independence, Classic Landscape, Italian Landscape, Views of Sicily, Ionian Landscape, Banks of the Bosphorous, The Ruins - Port of Goats, Isola Bella, Scenic America, Zones Terrestres and Decor Chinois. Other scenic papers are also included, along with room installations. The scenic miniatures are enclosed in a black portfolio with a large gold Diament label.
name: Scenic - portfolio
